v3.0.description: Discover Microsoft Azure Database for MariaDB resources
v3.0.name: Microsoft Azure Database for MariaDB

v3.1.description: Discover Microsoft Azure Database for MariaDB resources
v3.1.name: Microsoft Azure Database for MariaDB

host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les instances Azure Database for MariaDB via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure Database for MariaDB resources using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure Database for MariaDB service using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-MariaDB

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin pack to monitor Azure Database for MariaDB resources using RestAPI or AZCLI.**

Available Host template and related Services:

|Cloud-Azure-Database-MariaDB-custom|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Memory|
|Traffic|
|Storage|
|Connections|
|Replication|
|Io-consumption|


This Plugin Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

**Plugin Pack pour superviser les ressources Azure Database for MariaDB via RestAPI ou AZCLI.**

Modèle d\'hôte disponibles et services associés:

|Cloud-Azure-Database-MariaDB-custom|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Memory|
|Traffic|
|Storage|
|Connections|
|Replication|
|Io-consumption|

Ce Plugin Pack fournit un *provider* Host Discovery pour le module d\'auto-découverte d\'Hôtes

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 20.10.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure Database for MariaDB
